questions.questionTitle: What are the speakers mainly discussing?
anwers: When to launch a new product

questions.questionTitle: When does the conversation take place?

script:
� Our revenues are down 20 percent this quarter. Anyone have ideas how to bring them up?
� I think we need to promote more heavily. Our new X-3PO is a great product. Once more people know about it, sales will soar. This will create demand for our other products.
� So, are you saying we should spend more money on advertising?
� Not necessarily. But we should try different advertisements designed to get the X-3PO in customers' hands. Like 2-for-1 deals, and free downloads on new X-3POs.
